head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths VEITCH, LEE MURPHY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths VEITCH, LEE MURPHY

block.p: VEITCH-Lee Murphy died on 18th October, after a courageous fight with the ''big C''. Dearly loved and ever loving wife of Robin, beloved daughter of Jean & Albert Murphy and sister of David Murphy. Funeral service to be held at Mortlake Crematorium, Kew Meadow Path, Richmond, London on Wednesday, November 1st at 2:00PM. Family flowers only but donations, if desired, to The Mayhew Animal Home or The Royal Marsden Hospital Charity C/O Holmes & Daughters, 461 Upper Richmond Road West, London SW14 7PU, UK. Phone: 01144.208.392.1012
